response.overview: A bumbling tramp desires to build a home with a young woman, yet is thwarted time and time again by his lack of experience and habit of being in the wrong place at the wrong time..
response.tagline: He stands alone as the greatest entertainer of modern times! No one on earth can make you laugh as heartily or touch your heart as deeply...the whole world laughs, cries and thrills to his priceless genius!
response.title: Modern Times

cast.name: Al Ernest Garcia
cast.character: President of the Electro Steel Corp.

cast.name: Heinie Conklin
cast.character: Assembly Line Worker Next to Big Bill (uncredited)

release_dates.note: Rivoli Theatre, New York City, New York

results.name: Peter Bogdanovich on Charlie Chaplin Film MODERN TIMES
